scripts.test-funky: wat2wasm tests/funky-kart.wat -o tests/funky-kart.wasm && cargo run && wasm2wat tests/funky-kart-instrumented.wasm --enable-multi-memory -o tests/funky-kart-instrumented.wat
scripts.test-call-indirect: wat2wasm tests/call_indirect.wat -o tests/call_indirect.wasm && cargo run && wasm2wat tests/call_indirect-instrumented.wasm --enable-multi-memory
